name: Oathsworn Eye
description: A national treasure of Byakuyakoku stored in the Dainichi Mikoshi. With the coming of the Serpent God, this item was used to notarize great oaths and wishes.

passiveDescription.0: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>24%</cryo> for 10s after using an Elemental Skill.
passiveDescription.1: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>30%</cryo> for 10s after using an Elemental Skill.
passiveDescription.2: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>36%</cryo> for 10s after using an Elemental Skill.
passiveDescription.3: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>42%</cryo> for 10s after using an Elemental Skill.
passiveDescription.4: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>48%</cryo> for 10s after using an Elemental Skill.
